dmca.title: Counterfeit Epiphone (Gibson) Product -
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Ric Olsen [mailto:Ric.Olsen@gibson.com] 
Posted At: Tuesday, June 13, 2006 12:09 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: Counterfeit Epiphone (Gibson) Product - 
Subject: Counterfeit Epiphone (Gibson) Product - 
Importance: High


 To Whom It May Concern :
 
We have been investigating a rather large ring in China that are
counterfeiting Gibson Guitar product, (not to mention other musical
instrument manufactures as well as other manufactured goods).
 
The following website which The Planet hosts is overtly posting and
selling counterfeit Epiphone product manufactured by Gibson Guitar Corp
(www.gibson.com <http://www.gibson.com> ) :   
 
http://www.longmarket.com/productdisplay.php?sortid=30
<http://www.longmarket.com/productdisplay.php?sortid=30>  
 
We have attempted to determine the registrants/owners of this web store
to no avail as the "whois" information has been masked.  The unlawful
use of our trademarks, trade dress, copyrights, and logos is not
authorized by Gibson Guitar Corp, its agent, or the law and we intend on
prosecuting to the full extent available. 
 
Under the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1988, service providers
are expected to remove material from users' web sites that appears to
constitute copyright infringement. The information in this notification
is accurate, and under penalty of perjury, and I am authorized to act on
behalf of Gibson Guitar Corp relative to these infringing and
counterfeit items.
 
 Hence, we  demand the following:

*        That their website be taken down immediately - at least relative
to any posts or sales bearing the Gibson and Epiphone logos.   

        http://www.longmarket.com/
         
        http://www.longmarket.com/productdisplay.php?sortid=30
<http://www.longmarket.com/productdisplay.php?sortid=30>  

 
I would be happy to answer any questions you may have to prompt this
along. We are getting a few hundred calls a day now from concerned
consumers and our authorized dealers. 
 
 
 
Sincerely, 
 
Ric Olsen  
 
 
cc: Roxanne Khazarian, Esq
 
 
Ric Olsen
Director of Security/Loss Prevention
Gibson Guitar Corp
309 Plus Park Boulevard
Nashville, TN 37217
phone: 615 871 4500 x2431
fax: 615 884 9431
ric.olsen@gibson.com
 
CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: This e-mail communication and any attachments
may contain confidential and privileged information for the use of the
designated recipients named above.Any unauthorized review, use,
disclosure or distribution is prohibited.If you are not the intended
recipient, please contact the sender by reply email and destroy all
copies of the original message.To reply to our administrator, send an
email to support@gibson.com
